FUNC.NAME: usPlanet
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to enable or disable the usplanet decoder.

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to read only usplanet labels:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="allDecoders:disabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="usplanet:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to read only usplanet labels:
The following example enables the scanner to read only usplanet labels:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-all_decoders" Content="disabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-usplanet" Content="enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-enabled" Content="SCN1">

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to read all labels except usplanet:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="allDecoders:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="usplanet:disabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports usplanet.
